description:
Chie hears from Mob that something is inside Kaya’s house, and it’s time for her to do home visits.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Lost Kids Aren`t Scary / Dolls Aren`t Scary / Home Visits Aren`t Scary?
Maigo wa Kowakunai / Oningyou wa Kowakunai / Kateihoumon wa Kowakunai?
迷子はコワくない / お人形はコワくない / 家庭訪問はコワくない?
